page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: AFTER SECONDARY TWO IN BRORA YOU MUST GO TO GOLSPIE HIGH SCHOOL,THE LARGEST SECONDARY SCHOOL IN SUTHERLAND TO COMPLETE THIRD,FOURTH,FIFTH AND SIXTH YEAR.IN FOURTH YEAR YOU TAKE YOUR O-GRADES BY THEN YOU ARE SIXTEEN AND HAVE THE RIGHT TO LEAVE SCHOOL IF YOU WISH TO. IF WHEN YOU ARE FINISHED YOUR MAIN EDUCATION YOU WISH TO GO TO COLLEGE YOU HAVE TO TRAVEL DOWN THE COAST TO ABERDEEN,GLASGOW OR EDINBURGH.OR IF WISH TO GO TO UNIVERSITY THEN EDINBURGH IS THE NEAREST PLACE TO BRORA.BUT IF IT IS THE TECHNICAL COLLEGE YOU WANT,YOU CAN GO TO EITHER INVERNESS OR THURSO.
